chatbot.description: The chatbot (Tobi) was unable to assist the customer with their issue of a pending purchase and debited bank account.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's capabilities to handle issues related to pending purchases and debited bank accounts.

complaint.description: The customer complains about the worst service from Vodacom after purchasing a 10GB data plan that showed as pending in the Vodacom App, but the customer's bank account was debited immediately.
complaint.suggestion: Resolve the pending purchase issue and refund the customer's money promptly.

meta.review_content:
I would give it a zero start but because I cannot; a one will do.
I purchased a 10GB in the morning via the Vodacom App and it said "Pending" however my bank account was debited immediately. 
I tried restating the App, sending an email to customer care but I am just sent to the chat bot (Tobi) that cannot assist me with this issue.
It is extremely frustrating as the money was taken from my account and yet; No Service what's so ever.
